attributes.action: Urge the UK Government to Intervene in the Gaza Strip Blockade
attributes.additional_details: This blockade has resulted in a severe shortage of food, water, medicine, fuel and electricity - essentials that every human being has a right to access. The situation is dire and worsening by the minute. The UK government’s current stance does not reflect its commitment towards upholding human rights globally.Therefore, we call upon our elected representatives
attributes.background: Uk has long been a supporter of Israel but now time for them to use their influence for good to intervene on behalf of those suffering under this brutal siege. We wont stand by while innocent lives continue to be lost. The UK current stance does not reflect its commitment towards human rights.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648383
